# The `GCOVBuffer` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcovbuffer">GCOVBuffer</a> - A wrapper around <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorybuffer">MemoryBuffer</a> to provide <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/gcov">GCOV</a> specific read operations. <a href="#details">More...</a>
